title: 106_hr4521
content: Directs the Secretary to upgrade and continue the maintenance of utility systems which service the Park and its related facilities. Authorizes appropriations. Requires the Secretary to complete a comprehensive plan for visitor facilities in the Park by a specified deadline. Prescribes plan contents, including a plan for private financing of rehabilitation of lodging facilities and associated property listed on the National Register of Historic Places, which may include historic tax credits, hotel revenue, and other financing alternatives. Requires a report on the plan to specified congressional committees. Authorizes appropriations.
